actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to direct the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study of the provisions of State unemployment compensation laws relating to availability for work or refusal to accept work.

summary.text: Directs the Comptroller General to conduct a study of the provisions of State unemployment compensation laws relating to availability for work or refusal to accept work to determine whether they are effective in preventing persons who refuse to accept employment from receiving unemployment compensation.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study of the provisions of State unemployment compensation laws relating to availability for work or refusal to accept work.
